_sText:
Well, this map goes to all of you out there who have a hostie server.

Just made this in my spare time.
There are two cells right out of the terrorist spawn.

There are 15 terrorists slots and 16 counterterrorist.

The map includes the following:

A chicken battle ring
A gun toss
Shot for Shot area
4 Themed cells (seizure, zombie, nature, and aquatic)
A lava pit for people to jump across
And finally, rooftop access for those who want to rebel.
Monitors to watch the terrorists in the themed cells.

I recommend that you only put 1 terrorist in each themed cell.
If you do not then the two will get stuck together.

Thanks to Major Pain for the rooftop idea.
Also, thanks to Karatek√§fer for the skybox texture.

And thanks to Espilon for the prefabs.

FOR FINALE VERSION:

made it so only one person can go in each themed cell.
ct ladder to roof.
